           Search Google Scholar for Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_20" id="content10101170">
          <div id="boxatt10101170" class="boxatt">
           <label for="searchText10101170">
            <img alt="Google Scholar Logo" src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/google_scholar.jpg" />
           </label>
           <br />
           <input type="text" value="" id="searchText10101170" class="google_search_box" title="Google scholar search" />
           <br />
           <input type="button" onclick="var queryString = document.getElementById('searchText10101170').value;queryString = queryString.replace(/\\+/g, '+');var url = 'http://scholar.google.com/scholar?q=' + queryString;window.open(url,'GScholar');" value="Search" />

     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21146982">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21146982">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21146982">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Dawn Porter (15 September 2015)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content21146982">
          <p>
           <strong>
            Works about Dawn Porter and her films
            <br />
           </strong>
          </p>
          <blockquote>
           <p>
            &ldquo;Dawn Porter Took a Big Leap from Lawyer to a Filmmaker.&rdquo;
            <em>
             MSNBC
            </em>
            . N.p., 27 Feb. 2015. Web. 12 Aug. 2015. Available
            <a href="http://www.msnbc.com/msnbc/dawn-porter-took-big-risk-being-lawyer-filmmaker">
             here
            </a>
            .
           </p>
           <p>
            Henry, Jessica S. "When Poverty Is the Worst Crime of All: A Film Review of Gideon&rsquo;s Army (2013)."
            <em>
             Criminal Justice Policy Review
            </em>
            25.5 (2014): 653-656. Academic Search Complete . Web. 21 July 2015. Available
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&amp;db=aph&amp;AN=97380100&amp;site=ehost-live&amp;scope=site">
             here
            </a>
            .
           </p>
          </blockquote>
          <p>
           <strong>
            Works about mass racialized incarceration
            <br />
           </strong>
          </p>
          <blockquote>
           Alexander, Michelle.
           <em>
            The New Jim Crow: Mass Incarceration in the Age of Colorblindness
           </em>
           . Revised edition. New York: New Press, 2011. Available in Trexler Library, call # 364.973 A377n.
          </blockquote>
          <blockquote>
           Fortner, Michael Javen. "The &ldquo;Silent Majority&rdquo; In Black And White: Invisibility And Imprecision in the Historiography Of Mass Incarceration."&nbsp;
           <i>
            Journal Of Urban History
           </i>
           &nbsp;40.2 (2014): 252-282.&nbsp;Academic Search Complete . Web. 12 Aug. 2015. Available
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&amp;db=aph&amp;AN=93911063&amp;site=ehost-live&amp;scope=site">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </blockquote>
          <blockquote>
           Kilgore, James. "Mass Incarceration: Examining and Moving Beyond the New Jim Crow."
           <em>
            Critical Sociology
           </em>
           (Sage Publications, Ltd.) 41.2 (2015): 283-295. Academic Search Complete . Web. 21 July 2015. Available
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://crs.sagepub.com/content/41/2/283">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </blockquote>
          <blockquote>
           Schlesinger, Traci. "The Failure of Race Neutral Policies: How Mandatory Terms and Sentencing Enhancements Contribute to Mass Racialized Incarceration."&nbsp;
           <i>
            Crime &amp; Delinquency
           </i>
           &nbsp;57.1 (2011): 56-81.&nbsp;Academic Search Complete . Web. 12 Aug. 2015. Available
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&amp;db=aph&amp;AN=55532536&amp;site=ehost-live&amp;scope=site">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </blockquote>
          <p>
          </p>
          <blockquote>
          </blockquote>
          <div id="boxatt21146982" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>

        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21146984">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21146984">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Daryl Johnson (21 September 2015)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content21146984">
          <p>
           <strong>
            Works by
           </strong>
           <strong>
            Daryl Johnson
           </strong>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Johnson, Daryl.
           <i>
            Right Wing Resurgence : How a Domestic Terrorist Threat Is Being Ignored
           </i>
           . Lanham : Rowman &amp; Littlefield Publishers, 2012. Print. Available in Trexler Library at call # 363.325 J665r.
          </p>
          <p>
           <strong>
            Works about
           </strong>
           <strong>
            Daryl Johnson
           </strong>
           <br />
          </p>
          <blockquote>
           <p>
            Ackerman, Spencer. &ldquo;DHS Crushed This Analyst for Warning About Far-Right Terror.&rdquo;
            <em>
             WIRED
            </em>
            . N.p., 7 Aug. 2012. Web. 12 Aug. 2015. Available
            <a href="http://www.wired.com/2012/08/dhs/">
             here
            </a>
            .
           </p>
          </blockquote>
          <p>
           <strong>
            Works about right-wing domestic terrorism
           </strong>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Atkins, Stephen E.&nbsp;
           <i>
            Encyclopedia of Right-Wing Extremism in Modern American History
           </i>
           . 1 online resource (xiii, 345 p.). Santa Barbara, Calif.: ABC-CLIO, 2011. WorldCat Discovery Service. Web. 12 Aug. 2015. Available&nbsp;
           <a href="http://link.worldcat.org/?jHome=https%3A%2F%2Fmuhlenberg.idm.oclc.org%2Flogin%3Furl%3Dhttp%3A%2F%2Fmuhlenberg.eblib.com%2Fpatron%2FFullRecord.aspx%3Fp%3D773394&amp;linktype=best">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Gruenewald, Jeff. "A Comparative Examination of Homicides Perpetrated By Far-Right Extremists."&nbsp;
           <i>
            Homicide Studies
           </i>
           &nbsp;15.2 (2011): 177-203.&nbsp;Academic Search Complete . Web. 12 Aug. 2015. Available&nbsp;
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&amp;db=aph&amp;AN=60978327&amp;site=ehost-live&amp;scope=site">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Noble, Kerry, and Jean. Rosenfeld.&nbsp;
           <i>
            Tabernacle of Hate Seduction into Right-Wing Extremism
           </i>
           . 2nd ed. 1 online resource (xxxiv, 463 p.) : ill. Syracuse, N.Y.: Syracuse University Press, 2010.&nbsp;
           <i>
            WorldCat Discovery Service
           </i>
           . Web. 12 Aug. 2015. Available&nbsp;
           <a href="http://link.worldcat.org/?jHome=https%3A%2F%2Fmuhlenberg.idm.oclc.org%2Flogin%3Furl%3Dhttp%3A%2F%2Fsite.ebrary.com%2Flib%2Fmuhlenberg%2FTop%3Fid%3D10493631&amp;linktype=best">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Vertigans, Stephen. "Beyond The Fringe? Radicalisation Within the American Far-Right."&nbsp;
           <i>
            Totalitarian Movements &amp; Political Religions
           </i>
           &nbsp;8.3/4 (2007): 641-659.&nbsp;Academic Search Complete . Web. 12 Aug. 2015. Available&nbsp;
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&amp;db=aph&amp;AN=27009804&amp;site=ehost-live&amp;scope=site">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           <strong>
            &nbsp;
           </strong>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">

       <div id="wrapbox21146986">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21146986">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21146986">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Robert Entman (30 September 2015)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content21146986">
          <p>
           <strong>
            Work
            <em>
            </em>
           </strong>
           <strong>
            s by Robert Entman
            <em>
            </em>
           </strong>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Entman, Robert M
           <em>
            .&nbsp;Democracy without Citizens : Media and the Decay of American Politics
           </em>
           . New York : Oxford University Press, 1989. Available
           <a href="http://link.worldcat.org/?jHome=https%3A%2F%2Fmuhlenberg.idm.oclc.org%2Flogin%3Furl%3Dhttp%3A%2F%2Fsite.ebrary.com%2Flib%2Fmuhlenberg%2FTop%3Fid%3D10142065&amp;linktype=best">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Entman, Robert M. "Framing Bias: Media in the Distribution of Power."
           <em>
            Journal of Communication
           </em>
           57.1 (2007): 163-173. Academic Search Complete . Web. 22 July 2015. Available
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&amp;db=aph&amp;AN=24074968&amp;login.asp&amp;site=ehost-live&amp;scope=site%20">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Entman, Robert M. "The Impact of Ideology on Legislative Behavior and Public Policy in the States."
           <em>
            Journal of Politics
           </em>
           45.1 (1983): 163. Academic Search Complete . Web. 22 July 2015. Available
           <a href="http://www.jstor.org.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/stable/2130329?seq=1#page_scan_tab_contents">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Entman, Robert M.
           <i>
            &nbsp;Projections of Power: Framing News, Public Opinion, and U.S. Foreign Policy.
           </i>
           Chicago: University of Chicago Press, 2003. Available in Trexler Library call #&nbsp;
           <span>
            327.73009 E61p.
           </span>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Entman, Robert M.&nbsp;
           <i>
            Scandal and Silence : Media Responses to Presidential Misconduct
           </i>
           . Cambridge, UK ; Polity Press, 2012. Available
           <a href="http://link.worldcat.org/?jHome=https%3A%2F%2Fmuhlenberg.idm.oclc.org%2Flogin%3Furl%3Dhttp%3A%2F%2Fsite.ebrary.com%2Flib%2Fmuhlenberg%2FDoc%3Fid%3D10692177&amp;linktype=best">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Entman, Robert M.&nbsp;"Theorizing Mediated Public Diplomacy: The U.S. Case."
           <em>
            International Journal of Press/Politics
           </em>
           13.2 (2008): 87-102. Academic Search Complete . Web. 22 July 2015. Available
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&amp;db=aph&amp;AN=31659974&amp;login.asp&amp;site=ehost-live&amp;scope=site">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Entman, Robert M., and Kimberly A. Gross. "Race to Judgment: Stereotyping Media and Criminal Defendants."&nbsp;
           <em>
            Law &amp; Contemporary Problems
           </em>
           &nbsp;71.4 (2008): 93-133. Academic Search Complete . Web. 22 July 2015.Available&nbsp;
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&amp;db=aph&amp;AN=35944404&amp;login.asp&amp;site=ehost-live&amp;scope=site%20">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Paletz, David L., and Robert M. Entman.&nbsp;
           <em>
            Media Power Politics.
           </em>
           &nbsp;New York : Free Press, 1981.
           <i>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </i>
           Available in Trexler Library call #&nbsp;
           <span>
            071.3 P157m.
           </span>
          </p>
          <p>
           <strong>
            Works about Robert Entman
            <br />
           </strong>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            Robert Entman
           </em>
           . George Washington University. 2015. Web. 22 July 2015. Available
           <a href="http://smpa.gwu.edu/robert-entman">
            here
           </a>

          </p>
          <p>

            <br />
           </strong>
          </p>

           <i>
            The 1970s a New Global History from Civil Rights to Economic Inequality
           </i>
           . 1 online resource (xiv, 401 pages). Princton, N.J.: Princeton University Press, 2012. WorldCat Discovery Service. Web. 13 Aug. 2015. Available&nbsp;
           <a href="http://link.worldcat.org/?jHome=https%3A%2F%2Fmuhlenberg.idm.oclc.org%2Flogin%3Furl%3Dhttp%3A%2F%2Fsite.ebrary.com%2Flib%2Fmuhlenberg%2FTop%3Fid%3D10496630&amp;linktype=best">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           &nbsp;Carpenter, Zoe. "Beware The Inequality Opportunists."&nbsp;
           <i>
            Nation
           </i>
           &nbsp;298.16 (2014): 22-24.&nbsp;Academic Search Complete . Web. 13 Aug. 2015. Available&nbsp;
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&amp;db=aph&amp;AN=95399238&amp;login.asp&amp;site=ehost-live&amp;scope=site">
            here
           </a>

          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           &nbsp;Daguerre, Anne. "US Social Policy In The 21St Century: The Difficulties Of Comprehensive Social Reform."&nbsp;
           <i>
            Social Policy &amp; Administration
           </i>
           &nbsp;45.4 (2011): 389-407.&nbsp;
           <i>
            Academic Search Complete
           </i>
           . Web. 13 Aug. 2015. Available&nbsp;
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&amp;db=aph&amp;AN=61301350&amp;login.asp&amp;site=ehost-live&amp;scope=site">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           &nbsp;Levine, Adam Seth. "Financial Threats And Self-Undermining Rhetoric."&nbsp;
           <i>
            Social Policy
           </i>
           &nbsp;45.2 (2015): 55-59.Academic Search Complete . Web. 13 Aug. 2015. Available&nbsp;
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&amp;db=aph&amp;AN=108397461&amp;login.asp&amp;site=ehost-live&amp;scope=site">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           &nbsp;Smith, Mark A.&nbsp;
           <i>
            The Right Talk: How Conservatives Transformed the Great Society into the Economic Society
           </i>
           . 1 online resource (267 pages) : illustrations. Princeton: Princeton University Press, 2007. WorldCat Discovery Service. Web. 13 Aug. 2015. Available&nbsp;

            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>

           <span class="Z3988" title="url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzotero.org%3A2&amp;rft_id=urn%3Aisbn%3A978-1-4008-3071-8%201-4008-3071-0&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=The%20right%20talk%20how%20conservatives%20transformed%20the%20Great%20Society%20into%20the%20economic%20society&amp;rft.place=Princeton&amp;rft.publisher=Princeton%20University%20Press&amp;rft.aufirst=Mark%20A.&amp;rft.aulast=Smith&amp;rft.au=Mark%20A.%20Smith&amp;rft.date=2007&amp;rft.isbn=978-1-4008-3071-8%201-4008-3071-0&amp;rft.language=English">

          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Orin Kerr (14 October 2015)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content21146987">
          <p>
           <strong>
            Work
            <em>
            </em>
           </strong>
           <strong>
            s by Orin Kerr
            <em>
            </em>
           </strong>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Kerr, Orin S. "The Fourth Amendment and the Global Internet."&nbsp;
           <em>
            Stanford Law Review
           </em>
           &nbsp;67.2 (2015): 285-329. Academic Search Complete . Web. 22 July 2015. Available&nbsp;
           <a href="http://www.lexisnexis.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/lnacui2api/api/version1/getDocCui?lni=5FBR-FW10-00CW-81B8&amp;csi=7353&amp;hl=t&amp;hv=t&amp;hnsd=f&amp;hns=t&amp;hgn=t&amp;oc=00240&amp;perma=true">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Kerr, Orin S. "Internet Surveillance Law After the USA Patriot Act: The Big Brother That Isn't."&nbsp;
           <em>
            Northwestern University Law Review
           </em>
           &nbsp;97.2 (2003): 607-673. Academic Search Complete . Web. 22 July 2015. Available&nbsp;
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&amp;db=aph&amp;AN=15093300&amp;login.asp&amp;site=ehost-live&amp;scope=site">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Kerr, Orin S. "Katz Has Only One Step: The Irrelevance of Subjective Expectations."&nbsp;
           <em>
            University Of Chicago Law Review
           </em>
           &nbsp;82.1 (2015): 113-134. Academic Search Complete . Web. 22 July 2015. Available&nbsp;
           <a href="http://www.lexisnexis.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/lnacui2api/api/version1/getDocCui?lni=5FJ3-1C60-00CV-K12Y&amp;csi=7358&amp;hl=t&amp;hv=t&amp;hnsd=f&amp;hns=t&amp;hgn=t&amp;oc=00240&amp;perma=true">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Kerr, Orin S. "The Next Generation Communications Privacy Act."
           <em>
            University Of Pennsylvania Law Review
           </em>
           162.2 (2014): 373-419. Academic Search Complete . Web. 22 July 2015. Available
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&amp;db=aph&amp;AN=93917886&amp;site=ehost-live&amp;scope=site">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div class="csl-bib-body" style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <div class="csl-entry">
            Kerr, Orin S., and Brookings Institution.
            <i>
             Use Restrictions and the Future of Surveillance Law
            </i>
            . 11 p. : digital, PDF file. Washington, DC: Brookings, 2011.
            <i>
             WorldCat Discovery Service
            </i>
            . Web. 13 Aug. 2015. Available
            <a href="http://www.brookings.edu/~/media/Files/rc/papers/2011/0419_surveillance_laws_kerr/0419_surveillance_law_kerr.pdf">
             here
            </a>
            .
           </div>
           <span class="Z3988" title="url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzotero.org%3A2&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=Use%20restrictions%20and%20the%20future%20of%20surveillance%20law&amp;rft.place=Washington%2C%20DC&amp;rft.publisher=Brookings&amp;rft.series=Governance%20studies%20at%20Brookings%3B%20Governance%20studies%20at%20Brookings.&amp;rft.aufirst=Orin%20S.&amp;rft.aulast=Kerr&amp;rft.au=Orin%20S.%20Kerr&amp;rft.au=Brookings%20Institution.&amp;rft.date=2011&amp;rft.language=English">
           </span>
          </div>
          <p>
           <strong>
            Works about Orin Kerr
            <br />
           </strong>

           </em>

           </i>
           &nbsp;02 June 2015: A1+.&nbsp;Academic Search Complete . Web. 13 Aug. 2015. Available&nbsp;

            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>

           Barnett, Randy. &ldquo;Why the NSA Data Seizures Are Unconstitutional.&rdquo;&nbsp;
           <i>
            Harvard Journal of Law &amp; Public Policy
           </i>
           &nbsp;38.1 (2015): 3&ndash;20. Print. Available&nbsp;
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&amp;db=aph&amp;AN=101616869&amp;login.asp&amp;site=ehost-live&amp;scope=site">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Bejesky, Robert. &ldquo;Sixty Shades of Terror Plots: Locating the Actus Reus and the Hypothetical Line for Entrapment.&rdquo;&nbsp;
           <i>
            Creighton Law Review
           </i>
           &nbsp;48.3 (2015): 393&ndash;459. Available&nbsp;
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&amp;db=aph&amp;AN=103683087&amp;login.asp&amp;site=ehost-live&amp;scope=site">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Deflem, Mathieu, and Shannon McDonough. "The Fear of Counterterrorism: Surveillance and Civil Liberties Since 9/11."&nbsp;
           <i>
            Society
           </i>
           &nbsp;52.1 (2015): 70-79.&nbsp;Academic Search Complete . Web. 13 Aug. 2015. Available&nbsp;
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&amp;db=aph&amp;AN=100710979&amp;login.asp&amp;site=ehost-live&amp;scope=site">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Setty, Sudha. "Surveillance, Secrecy, And The Search For Meaningful Accountability."&nbsp;
           <i>
            Stanford Journal of International Law
           </i>
           &nbsp;51.1 (2015): 69-103.&nbsp;Academic Search Complete . Web. 13 Aug. 2015. Available&nbsp;
           <a href="http://www.lexisnexis.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/lnacui2api/api/version1/getDocCui?lni=5FPJ-85J0-00CV-X0Y4&amp;csi=142675&amp;hl=t&amp;hv=t&amp;hnsd=f&amp;hns=t&amp;hgn=t&amp;oc=00240&amp;perma=true">

          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Roseanne Scotti (20 October 2015)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content21146988">
          <p>
           <strong>
            Work
            <em>
            </em>
           </strong>
           <strong>
            s by Roseanne Scotti
            <em>
            </em>
           </strong>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Porter, Judith, David Metzger, and Roseanne Scotti. "Bridge to Services: Drug Injectors' Awareness and Utilization of Drug User Treatment and Social Service Referrals, Medical Care, and HIV Testing Provided By Needle Exchange Programs."
           <em>
            Substance Use &amp; Misuse
           </em>
           37.11 (2002): 1305. Academic Search Complete . Web. 23 July 2015. Available
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&amp;db=aph&amp;AN=7416327&amp;login.asp&amp;site=ehost-live&amp;scope=site%20">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Mark, Hayley Diana, et al. "Profiles Of Self-Reported HIV-Risk Behaviors Among Injection Drug Users In Methadone Maintenance Treatment, Detoxification, And Needle Exchange Programs."
           <em>
            Public Health Nursing
           </em>
           23.1 (2006): 11-19. Academic Search Complete . Web. 23 July 2015. Available
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&amp;db=aph&amp;AN=19589770&amp;login.asp&amp;site=ehost-live&amp;scope=site">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           MacQueen, Kathleen M., et al. "What Is Community? An Evidence-Based Definition For Participatory Public Health."
           <em>
            American Journal of Public Health
           </em>
           91.12 (2001): 1929-1938. Academic Search Complete . Web. 23 July 2015. Available
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&amp;db=aph&amp;AN=5581782&amp;login.asp&amp;site=ehost-live&amp;scope=site">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           <strong>
            Works about Roseanne Scotti
            <br />
           </strong>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            Roseanne Scotti
           </em>
           . Drug Policy Alliance. 2015. Web. 2 August 2015. Available
           <a href="http://www.drugpolicy.org/staff-and-board/staff/roseanne-scotti-state-director-new-jersey">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           <strong>
            Works about the war on drugs
           </strong>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Baird, Vanessa. "Legalize Drugs - All Of Them! (Cover Story)."&nbsp;
           <i>
            New Internationalist
           </i>
           &nbsp;455 (2012): 12-17.&nbsp;Academic Search Complete . Web. 13 Aug. 2015. Available&nbsp;
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&amp;db=aph&amp;AN=78555508&amp;site=ehost-live&amp;scope=site">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Cohen, Joseph A. "The Highs Of Tomorrow: Why New Laws And Policies Are Needed To Meet The Unique Challenges Of Synthetic Drugs."&nbsp;
           <i>
            Journal Of Law &amp; Health
           </i>
           &nbsp;27.2 (2014): 163-185.&nbsp;Academic Search Complete . Web. 13 Aug. 2015. Available&nbsp;
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&amp;db=aph&amp;AN=98586447&amp;site=ehost-live&amp;scope=site">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Dickinson, Tim. "The War on Drugs Is Burning Out. (Cover Story)."&nbsp;
           <i>
            Rolling Stone
           </i>
           &nbsp;1226 (2015): 33-37.Academic Search Complete . Web. 13 Aug. 2015. Available&nbsp;
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&amp;db=aph&amp;AN=100185531&amp;site=ehost-live&amp;scope=site">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           "Legalizing Marijuana For Medical Purposes Will Increase Risk Of Long-Term, Deleterious Consequences For Adolescents."&nbsp;
           <i>
            Drug &amp; Alcohol Dependence
           </i>
           &nbsp;149.(2015): 298-303.&nbsp;Academic Search Complete . Web. 13 Aug. 2015. Available&nbsp;
           <a href="http://ac.els-cdn.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/S0376871615000253/1-s2.0-S0376871615000253-main.pdf?_tid=ab105d22-41f6-11e5-8943-00000aacb360&amp;acdnat=1439496519_917d332918104e41cdab9eb3d1cb3466">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Reznicek, Michael J.&nbsp;
           <i>
            Blowing Smoke: Rethinking the War on Drugs without Prohibition and Rehab
           </i>
           . Lanham, Md.: Rowman &amp; Littlefield Publishers, 2012. Print. Available in Trexler Library call #&nbsp;362.2916 R467b&nbsp;.
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Scott, Peter Dale.&nbsp;
           <i>
            American War Machine Deep Politics, the CIA Global Drug Connection, and the Road to Afghanistan
           </i>
           . 1 online resource (xii, 396 p.). Lanham, Md.: Rowman &amp; Littlefield Publishers, 2010.&nbsp;
           <i>
            WorldCat Discovery Service
           </i>
           . Web. 13 Aug. 2015. Available&nbsp;
           <a href="http://link.worldcat.org/?jHome=https%3A%2F%2Fmuhlenberg.idm.oclc.org%2Flogin%3Furl%3Dhttp%3A%2F%2Fsite.ebrary.com%2Flib%2Fmuhlenberg%2FTop%3Fid%3D10434937&amp;linktype=best">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           <strong>

           <span class="Z3988" title="url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzotero.org%3A2&amp;rft_id=urn%3Aisbn%3A978-1-4422-1514-6%201-4422-1514-3&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=Blowing%20smoke%3A%20rethinking%20the%20war%20on%20drugs%20without%20prohibition%20and%20rehab&amp;rft.place=Lanham%2C%20Md.&amp;rft.publisher=Rowman%20%26%20Littlefield%20Publishers&amp;rft.aufirst=Michael%20J.&amp;rft.aulast=Reznicek&amp;rft.au=Michael%20J.%20Reznicek&amp;rft.date=2012&amp;rft.tpages=ix%2C%20221&amp;rft.isbn=978-1-4422-1514-6%201-4422-1514-3&amp;rft.language=English">

       <div id="wrapbox21146989">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21146989">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21146989">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Jesselyn Radack (27 October 2015)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content21146989">
          <p>
           <strong>
            Work
            <em>
            </em>
           </strong>
           <strong>
            s by Jesselyn Radack
           </strong>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Radack, Jesselyn. "Justice Demands Equal Treatment."&nbsp;
           <i>
            USA Today
           </i>
           &nbsp;01/16/2015 (2015). Print. Available
           <a href="http://www.lexisnexis.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/lnacui2api/api/version1/getDocCui?lni=5F33-7S81-JC8N-K323&amp;csi=8213&amp;hl=t&amp;hv=t&amp;hnsd=f&amp;hns=t&amp;hgn=t&amp;oc=00240&amp;perma=true">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Radack, Jesselyn. "Snowden's Courage."&nbsp;
           <em>
            Nation
           </em>
           &nbsp;297.19 (2013): 4-8. Academic Search Complete . Web. 23 July 2015. Available&nbsp;
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&amp;db=aph&amp;AN=91764801&amp;login.asp&amp;site=ehost-live&amp;scope=site">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Radack, Jesselyn. "Tortured Legal Ethics : The Role of the Government Advisor in the War on Terrorism."&nbsp;
           <i>
            University of Colorado Law Review
           </i>
           &nbsp;Vol. 77, No. 1, P. 1-48 (2006). Print. Available&nbsp;
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&amp;db=ofm&amp;AN=502529896&amp;site=ehost-live&amp;scope=site">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Radack, Jesselyn, and Glenn Greenwald.&nbsp;
           <i>
            Traitor : The Whistleblower and the "American Taliban".
           </i>
           [2nd ed.]. United States, 2012. Print. Available in Trexler Library, call # 353.46 R124t
          </p>
          <p>
           <strong>
            Works about Jesselyn Radack
            <br />
           </strong>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Abraham, Laurie. "Anatomy Of A Whistle Blower."
           <em>
            Mother Jones
           </em>
           29.1 (2004): 60-85. Academic Search Complete . Web. 23 July 2015. Available
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&amp;db=aph&amp;AN=11853009&amp;login.asp&amp;site=ehost-live&amp;scope=site">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Leslie, Gregg. "Justice And The Whistleblower."
           <em>
            News Media &amp; The Law
           </em>
           27.3 (2003): 4-6. Academic Search Complete . Web. 23 July 2015. Available
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&amp;db=aph&amp;AN=10719157&amp;login.asp&amp;site=ehost-live&amp;scope=site">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Radack, Jesselyn. "Whistleblowing: My Story."&nbsp;
           <em>
            Nation
           </em>
           &nbsp;&nbsp;04 July 2005: 8+. Academic Search Complete . Web. 23 July 2015. Available&nbsp;
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&amp;db=aph&amp;AN=17341503&amp;login.asp&amp;site=ehost-live&amp;scope=site">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           <strong>
            Works about whistlebowing
            <br />
           </strong>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Delmas, Candice. "The Ethics Of Government Whistleblowing."&nbsp;
           <i>
            Social Theory &amp; Practice
           </i>
           &nbsp;41.1 (2015): 77-105.Academic Search Complete . Web. 13 Aug. 2015. Available&nbsp;
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&amp;db=aph&amp;AN=100170490&amp;site=ehost-live&amp;scope=site">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Johnson, Roberta Ann.&nbsp;
           <i>
            Whistleblowing: When It Works--and Why
           </i>
           . Boulder: L. Rienner Publishers, 2003.&nbsp;
           <i>
            WorldCat Discovery Service
           </i>
           . Web. 13 Aug. 2015. Available in Trexler Library, call #&nbsp;174.4 J68w.
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Scheuerman, William E. "Whistleblowing As Civil Disobedience: The Case Of Edward Snowden."&nbsp;
           <i>
            Philosophy &amp; Social Criticism
           </i>
           &nbsp;40.7 (2014): 609-628.&nbsp;
           <i>
            Academic Search Complete
           </i>
           . Web. 13 Aug. 2015. Available&nbsp;
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://psc.sagepub.com/content/40/7/609">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21146989" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21146990">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21146990">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21146990">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Maajid Nawaz and Richard Kerbaj (10 or 11 November 2015)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content21146990">
          <p>
           <strong>
            Work
            <em>
            </em>
           </strong>
           <strong>
            s by Richard Kerbaj and Maajid Nawaz
           </strong>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Kerbaj, Richard. &ldquo;Missed Clues on Terror Suspects;&nbsp; Photo Proof of Arrest in Kenya ; Threats of Jihad Days before Attack.&rdquo;&nbsp;
           <i>
            The Sunday Times (London)
           </i>
           &nbsp;(2013): 1,2. Print. Available&nbsp;
           <a href="http://www.lexisnexis.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/lnacui2api/api/version1/getDocCui?lni=58H4-69T1-DY9P-N3BP&amp;csi=8411&amp;hl=t&amp;hv=t&amp;hnsd=f&amp;hns=t&amp;hgn=t&amp;oc=00240&amp;perma=true">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Kerbaj, Richard. "Purge on Muslim Clerics Who Turn a Blind Eye to the Abuse of Women."&nbsp;
           <i>
            The Times
           </i>
           &nbsp;
           <i>
            (London)
           </i>
           . (September 26, 2008). LexisNexis Academic. Web. 2015/08/14. Available&nbsp;
           <a href="http://www.lexisnexis.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/lnacui2api/api/version1/getDocCui?lni=4TJ0-DM70-TX38-S0KK&amp;csi=8411&amp;hl=t&amp;hv=t&amp;hnsd=f&amp;hns=t&amp;hgn=t&amp;oc=00240&amp;perma=true">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Kerbaj, Richard. &ldquo;Unshackling the Minds of Islamists.&rdquo;&nbsp;
           <i>
            The Australian
           </i>
           &nbsp;(2014): 17. Print. Available&nbsp;
           <a href="http://www.lexisnexis.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/lnacui2api/api/version1/getDocCui?lni=5D7K-Y9P1-F0JP-W33G&amp;csi=8411&amp;hl=t&amp;hv=t&amp;hnsd=f&amp;hns=t&amp;hgn=t&amp;oc=00240&amp;perma=true">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Nawaz, Maajid. "Democracy Is Our Revenge. (Cover Story)."&nbsp;
           <i>
            New Statesman
           </i>
           &nbsp;140.5039 (2011): 26-27.&nbsp;Academic Search Complete . Web. 13 Aug. 2015. Available&nbsp;
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&amp;db=aph&amp;AN=57857230&amp;login.asp&amp;site=ehost-live&amp;scope=site">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Nawaz, Maajid. A
           <i>
            &nbsp;Global Culture to Fight Extremism
           </i>
           . TEDGlobal, 2011. Film. Available&nbsp;
           <a href="https://www.ted.com/talks/maajid_nawaz_a_global_culture_to_fight_extremism?language=en">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Nawaz, Maajid. "The Path To Violence."&nbsp;
           <i>
            New Statesman
           </i>
           &nbsp;141.5113 (2012): 30-33.&nbsp;Academic Search Complete . Web. 13 Aug. 2015. Available&nbsp;
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&amp;db=aph&amp;AN=77538902&amp;login.asp&amp;site=ehost-live&amp;scope=site">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Nawaz, Maajid., and Tom. Bromley.&nbsp;
           <i>
            Radical: My Journey from Islamist Extremism to a Democratic Awakening
           </i>
           . London: WH Allen, 2012. Print. Available in Trexler Library call # 320.557092 N328r.
          </p>
          <p>
           <strong>
            Works about
           </strong>
           <strong>
           </strong>
           <strong>
            Maajid Nawaz&nbsp;
           </strong>
           <br />
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Dickey, Christopher. "The Repentant Radical."&nbsp;
           <i>
            Newsweek
           </i>
           &nbsp;160.17 (2012): 44-49.&nbsp;Academic Search Complete . Web. 13 Aug. 2015. Available
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&amp;db=aph&amp;AN=82575924&amp;login.asp&amp;site=ehost-live&amp;scope=site">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            Maajid Nawaz
           </em>
           . Quilliam Foundation. 2015. Web. 2 August 2015. Available
           <a href="http://www.quilliamfoundation.org/about/staff/maajid-nawaz/">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21146990" class="boxatt">
